You know what Portal is by now. You've seen it on Youtube, you're here to get the game, or even just reread old reviews. IT's a fantastic game. A 10/10. The only complaint: It's a little short. But only to the experienced player.
Awesome

No joke this game was pretty awesome. While I did get frustrated with the puzzles from time to time, it just made solving them all the more satisfying. I also loved how it goes from a seemingly harmless puzzle game into a literal fight for your life, and in such a clever way that doesn’t feel forced. Honestly I can’t think of anything negative to say about it; it’s just a good solid game from beginning to end. Can’t wait to play the sequel.
10/10 its great for LONG term play!

This game is way ahead of its time. Amazing physics and graphics (for its time). The story is hard to figure out, but when you do, it is epic.
Fun

This is a classic title that every gamer should experience.
The portals are disorienting and fascinating. The way they interact never gets stale, and mastering the portal gun makes you feel really cool.
However, this game is short- only 2-3 hours long. This helps prevent it getting stale, but for $10, it's less than optimal.
The story is interesting, the world is intriguing, and GlaDOS is a great character.

8/10 RIP Companion Cube.

This is one of my 100 percent achievement games. TBH it was pain in the ass, no surprise only 1,8 percent of people who played this game have all those achievements. The bonus games are the worst of human kinds creations but I loved this part of portal and the second one that much, that i couldn't let this one unfinished. I was frustrated but also felt relief in a way I didn't think was possible. Will never touch again because those levels will haunt me until death, but I enjoyed the story a lot. The game mechanics are just made for me.

Güzel bir bulmaca oyunu. Oyun bence çok basit. 19 bölüm var 60 dk da 15. bölüme geldim. Büyük ihtimal çoğu kişide de böyledir. Portal 1 ve 2 paketini çok ucuz bir fiyata aldım. 3TL falandı herhalde. Eğer indirimde görürseniz kesin alın. 1 buçuk, 2 saatte bitirip diğer oyuna geçersiniz. Oyun zor değil ama başınızı döndürüyor, o sıkıntı :D Son 4 bölüm baya sıkıntılı haberiniz olsun :D Diğerlerine göre daha çok uğraştırıyor.
